Name: Agency Qualifier Code
Notes: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values
Remarks: FA101 Identifies the organization controlling the assignment of financial accounting information.

Name: Service, Promotion, Allowance, or Charge Code
Notes: Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge
Remarks: FA102 Identifies the purpose of the accounting allowance or charge information.

Name: Allowance or Charge Indicator
Notes: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified
